articles.author: Mitch Phillips
articles.title: Athletics-Italy's Jacobs takes stunning 100 metres gold - Reuters
articles.description: Lamont Marcell Jacobs claimed a stunning upset victory in the Olympic men's 100 metres final on Sunday, becoming the first Italian to take the most coveted title in athletics and doing it in a European record time of 9.80 seconds.
articles.content: TOKYO, Aug 1 (Reuters) - Lamont Marcell Jacobs claimed a stunning upset victory in the Olympic men's 100 metres final on Sunday, becoming the first Italian to take the most coveted title in athletics… [+3447 chars]

articles.title: Wildfires in Turkey kill six, force tourists to flee by sea as blazes approach towns - ABC News
articles.description: About 100 Russian tourists are evacuated from Bodrum and people in Italy escape in dinghies as fires rage across southern Europe.
articles.content:
Panicked tourists in Turkey have hurried to rescue boats after being told to evacuate some hotels in the Aegean Sea resort town of Bodrum due to nearby wildfires.
